Name: Mida's Adventure
About the game: Mida is a brave adventurer seeking after lost technological artifacts. What kinds of trouble will try to stop her along the way? Jump back to the past in an experience influenced by Shareware games of old. Play through 30 levels across 3 episodes, collecting floppy disks, gemstones, and soda! Access locked doors, hit jump pads, push crates, dodge spiders, hide from snakes, and more! Welcome to Mida's Adventure!
